projects.name: GOshop
projects.about: GOshop is a full-stack mock online store still under development. Currently, users can create an account, post items, and add items to their cart. The project is hosted using Heroku.

projects.name: Vaporwave website
projects.about: This project is a website detailing the popular music microgenre 'vaporwave'. It includes a music player made with jQuery, allowing users to load and play songs mentioned throughout the content of the website.

projects.name: Conway's Game of Life
projects.about: An implementation of John Conway's Game of Life using ReactJS and Node.js.

projects.name: A Compiler for Jasonelle
projects.about: A compiler for creating JS-based web applications from Jasonelle.
